The DC for this dispel check is 11 + the spell's caster level.     If you target an object or creature that is under the effect of an ongoing spell (such as a monster summoned by Monster Summoning), you make a dispel check to end the spell that conjured the object or creature.     You automatically succeed on your dispel check against any spell that you cast yourself.  Area Dispel:  When Dispel Magic is used in this way, the spell affects everything within a 30-ft. radius. For each creature within the area that is the subject of one or more spells, you make a dispel check against the last cast spell back to the first cast spell until you dispel one spell (which discharges the Dispel Magic spell so far as that target is concerned). The creature's magic items are not affected.     For each ongoing spell whose area overlaps that of the Dispel Magic spell, you can make a dispel check to end the effect, but only within the overlapping area.     If an object or creature that is the effect of an ongoing spell (such as a monster summoned by Monster Summoning) is in the area, you can make a dispel check to end the spell that conjured that object or creature (returning it from whence it came) in addition to attempting to dispel spells targeting the creature or object.  Counterspell:  When Dispel Magic is used in this way, the spell targets a spellcaster and is cast as a counterspell. Unlike a true counterspell, however, Dispel Magic may not work; you must make a dispel check to counter the other spellcaster's spell.
TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC_GREATER:TAG_SPEL: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 5, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6This spell functions like ~Dispel Magic~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC], except that the maximum ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] on your dispel check is +20 instead of +10.
TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_WATER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Domain: Water~[TAG_WATER_D] 4This spell functions like ~Dispel Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_EVIL], except that you are surrounded by a misty blue, elemental energy, and the spell affects water creatures and spells rather than evil ones.
TAG_SPELLS_DISPLACEMENT:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Emulating the natural ability of the displacer beast, the subject of this spell appears to be about 2 feet away from its true location. The creature benefits from a 50% miss chance as if it had total ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT]. However, unlike actual total concealment, Displacement does not prevent enemies from targeting the creature normally. ~True Seeing~[TAG_SPELLS_TRUE_SEEING] reveals its true location.
TAG_SPELLS_DISRUPT_UNDEAD:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: RayDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou direct a ray of positive energy.  You must make a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to hit, and if the ray hits an undead creature, it deals 1d6 points of damage to it.
TAG_SPELLS_DIVINE_FAVOR:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 minuteCalling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 luck bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and weapon damage rolls for every three ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] you have (at least +1, maximum +3). The bonus doesn't apply to spell damage.
TAG_SPELLS_DIVINE_POWER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 round/levelCalling upon the divine power of your patron, you imbue yourself with strength and skill in combat. Your ~base attack bonus~[TAG_LEVEL_BONUSES] becomes equal to your character level (which may give you additional attacks), you gain a +6 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus to ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH], and you gain 1 ~temporary hit point~[TAG_TEMPORARY_HIT_POINTS] per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL].
TAG_SPELLS_DOMINATE_ANIMAL:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Domain: Animal~[TAG_ANIMAL_D] 3, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One animalDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesYou can enchant an animal and direct it with simple commands such as "Attack", "Run", and "Fetch". Suicidal or self-destructive commands are simply ignored. Dominate Animal establishes a mental link between you and the subject creature. The animal can be directed by silent mental command as long as it remains in range. You need not see the creature to control it. You do not receive direct sensory input from the creature, but you know what it is experiencing. Because you are directing the animal with your own intelligence, it may be able to undertake actions normally beyond its own comprehension. You need not concentrate exclusively on controlling the creature unless you are trying to direct it to do something it normally couldn't do.
TAG_SPELLS_SUGGESTION:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SO: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 9Target: One creatureThis spell functions like ~Dominate Person~[TAG_SPELLS_DOMINATE_PERSON], except that the spell is not restricted by creature type.
TAG_SPELLS_DOMINATE_PERSON:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One humanoidDuration: 1 day/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesYou can control the actions of any humanoid creature through a telepathic link that you establish with the subject's mind. Subjects resist this control, and any subject forced to take actions against its nature receives a new ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] with a +2 bonus. Obviously self-destructive orders are not carried out. Once control is established, the range at which it can be exercised is unlimited, as long as you and the subject are on the same plane. You need not see the subject to control it. ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL] or a similar spell can prevent you from using the telepathic link while the subject is so warded, but such an effect neither prevents the establishment of domination nor dispels it.
TAG_SPELLS_DOOM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERIC_1: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] Fear, Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One living creatureDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThis spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become ~shaken~[TAG_SHAKEN].
TAG_SPELLS_EAGLE'S_SPLENDOR:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: YesThe transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful. The spell grants a +4 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus to ~Charisma~[TAG_CHARISMA], adding the usual benefits to Charisma-based ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS] and other uses of the Charisma modifier. Sorcerers and bards (and other spellcasters who rely on Charisma) affected by this spell do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Charisma, but the save DCs for spells they cast while under this spell's effect do increase.
TAG_SPELLS_EAGLE'S_SPLENDOR_MASS:TAG_SPE: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 6, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Eagle's Splendor~[TAG_SPELLS_EAGLE'S_SPLENDOR], except that it affects multiple creatures.
TAG_SPELLS_ENDURE_ELEMENTS:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1, ~Domain: Sun~[TAG_SUN_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 24 hoursSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Endure Elements gives a creature a small amount of protection to damage from whichever one of five energy types you select: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic     Each round, the spell absorbs the first 5 points of damage that the creature would otherwise take from the specified energy type, regardless of whether the source of the damage is natural or magical. The spell protects the recipient's equipment as well. Endure Elements absorbs only damage. The character can still suffer unfortunate side effects, such as drowning in acid (since drowning damage comes from lack of oxygen) or becoming encased in ice. Note: Endure Elements overlaps (and does not stack with) ~Resist Energy~[TAG_SPELLS_RESIST_ENERGY] and ~Protection from Energy~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_ENERGY]. If a character is warded by Protection from Energy and one or both of the other spells, the protection spell absorbs damage until it is exhausted. If a character is warded by Resist Energy and Endure Elements at the same time, the resist spell absorbs damage but the endure spell does not.
TAG_SPELLS_ENLARGE_PERSON:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1, ~Domain: Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One humanoid creatureDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThis spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature. This increase changes the creature's ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER] category to the next larger one. The target gains a +2 size bonus to ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH], a -2 size penalty to ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY] (to a minimum of one), and a -1 penalty on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] due to its increased size. A humanoid creature whose size increases to Large has a space of 10 feet and a natural reach of 10 feet. This spell does not change the target's speed. All equipment worn or carried by a creature is similarly enlarged by the spell. Melee and projectile weapons affected by this spell deal more damage. Any weapon that leaves an enlarged creature's possession will instantaneously return to its normal size.
TAG_SPELLS_ENTANGLE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DRUI: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Domain: Plant~[TAG_PLANT_D] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: Plants in a 40-ft.-radius spreadDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] partial; see textSpell Resistance: NoGrasses, weeds, bushes, and even trees wrap, twist, and entwine about creatures in the area or those that enter the area, holding them fast and causing them to become ~entangled~[TAG_ENTANGLED]. The creature can break free and move at half its normal speed by using a ~full-round action~[TAG_FULL_ROUND_ACTION] to make a DC 20 ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH] check. A creature that succeeds on a Reflex save is not entangled, but can still move at only half speed through the area. On your turn each round, the plants once again attempt to entangle all creatures that have avoided or escaped entanglement. Note: The spell will not work where there are no plants.
TAG_SPELLS_ENTROPIC_SHIELD:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Luck~[TAG_LUCK_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./level (D)A magical field appears around you, glowing with a chaotic blast of multicolored hues. This field deflects incoming ~arrows~[TAG_WEAPONS_ARROWS], rays, and other ~ranged attacks~[TAG_RANGED_ATTACKS]. Each ranged attack directed at you for which the attacker must make an ~attack roll~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] (including arrows, magic arrows, ~Melf's Acid Arrow~[TAG_SPELLS_MELF'S_ACID_ARROW], ~Ray of Enfeeblement~[TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_ENFEEBLEMENT], and so forth) has a 20% miss chance (similar to ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT]). Other attacks that simply work at a distance are not affected.
TAG_SPELLS_EXPEDITIOUS_RETREAT:TAG_SPELL: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./level (D)This spell increases your base land speed by 30 feet. (This adjustment is treated as an enchantment bonus.)
TAG_SPELLS_EXTRAPLANAR_CHEST:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Summoning)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, S, FCasting Time: 10 minutesRange: See textEffect: See textDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoCo8 Note: This spell creates a miniature magic chest that you can use to summon a large magic chest in which to store items. Items stored in the Extraplanar Chest, and the chest itself, do not count against the load you are carrying and will not overburden you. After you have stored items in the large chest, you must use the miniature chest again to send the large chest back to the Ethereal Plane from whence it came, or it will remain wherever you leave it. Note: Any charged magical items (such as wands, staves, and rods) cannot be recovered from the chest once it has been sent back to the Ethereal Plane and should thus not be stored in it. Additionally, any magic weapons and armor with crafted attributes will lose those attributes if they are stored in the chest and the chest is sent back to the Ethereal Plane, so do not store crafted weapons and armor in the chest. All other items are unaffected. Focus: A chest that must be exceptionally well crafted and expensive, constructed for you by master crafters. The cost of such a chest is 5,000 gp. Once it is constructed, you must make a tiny replica (of the same materials and perfect in every detail), so that the miniature of the chest appears to be a perfect copy. (The replica costs 50 gp.) Note: The casting of this spell costs 5050 gold pieces.
TAG_SPELLS_EYEBITE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] (Evil)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One living creature Duration: 1 round per three levels; see textSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesEach round, you may target a single living creature, striking it with waves of evil power. Depending on the target's HD, this attack has as many as three effects.HD                   Effect10 or more   @t~Sickened~[TAG_SICKENED]5-9              @t~Panicked~[TAG_PANICKED], sickened4 or less    @tComatose, panicked, sickened The effects are cumulative and concurrent. Sickened     Sudden pain and fever sweeps over the subject's body. A sickened creature takes a -2 penalty on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], weapon damage rolls, ~saving throws~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC], ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS], and ability checks. A creature affected by this spell remains sickened for 10 minutes per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL]. The effects cannot be negated by a ~Remove Disease~[TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_DISEASE] or ~Heal~[TAG_SPELLS_HEAL] spell, but a ~Remove Curse~[TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_CURSE] is effective. Panicked     The subject becomes panicked for 1d4 rounds. Even after the panic ends, the creature remains ~shaken~[TAG_SHAKEN] for 10 minutes per caster level, and it automatically becomes panicked again if it comes within sight of you during that time. This is a ~fear~[TAG_FEAR] effect. Comatose     The subject falls into a catatonic coma for 10 minutes per caster level. During this time, it cannot be awakened by any means short of dispelling the effect. This is not a ~Sleep~[TAG_SPELLS_SLEEP] effect, and thus ~elves~[TAG_ELVES] are not immune to it. The spell lasts for 1 round per three caster levels. You must spend a move action each round after the first to target a foe.     Co8 Note: All the targets must be selected upon casting, and you subsequently sacrifice a move action each round after the first to target each successive foe until all foes have been targeted.
TAG_SPELLS_FAERIE_FIRE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_D: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Light)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: Creatures and objects within a 5-ft.-radius burstDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA pale glow surrounds and outlines the subjects. Outlined creatures do not benefit from the ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT] normally provided by darkness, ~Blur~[TAG_SPELLS_BLUR], ~Displacement~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPLACEMENT], ~Invisibility~[TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY], or similar effects. The light is too dim to have any special effect on undead or dark-dwelling creatures vulnerable to light. The Faerie Fire does not cause any harm to the objects or creatures thus outlined.
TAG_SPELLS_FALSE_LIFE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SO: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 hour/level or until discharged; see textYou harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death. While this spell is in effect, you gain ~temporary hit points~[TAG_TEMPORARY_HIT_POINTS] equal to 1d10 + 1 per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +10).
TAG_SPELLS_FEAR:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_3 T: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] Fear, Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 30 ft.Area: Cone-shaped burstDuration: 1 round/level or 1 round; see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] partialSpell Resistance: YesAn invisible cone of terror causes each living creature in the area to become ~panicked~[TAG_PANICKED] unless it succeeds on a Will save. If cornered, a panicked creature begins ~cowering~[TAG_COWERING]. If the Will save succeeds, the creature is ~shaken~[TAG_SHAKEN] for 1 round.
TAG_SPELLS_FEEBLEMIND:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SO: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One creature Duration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesIf the target creature fails a Will saving throw, its ~Intelligence~[TAG_INTELLIGENCE] and ~Charisma~[TAG_CHARISMA] scores each drop to 1, giving it roughly the intellect of a lizard. The affected creature is unable to use Intelligence or Charisma based ~skills~[TAG_SKILLS], cast spells, understand language, or communicate coherently. Still, it knows who its friends are and can follow them and even protect them. The subject remains in this state until a ~Heal~[TAG_SPELLS_HEAL] spell is used to cancel the effect of the Feeblemind. A creature that can cast arcane spells, such as a sorcerer or a wizard, takes a -4 penalty on its saving throw.
TAG_SPELLS_FIND_TRAPS:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CL: ~Divination~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DIVINATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./levelYou gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps. You can use the ~Search~[TAG_SEARCH] skill to ~detect traps~[TAG_CLASS_FEATURES_ROGUE_TRAPS] just as a ~rogue~[TAG_ROGUES] can. In addition, you gain an insight bonus equal to one-half your ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +10) on Search checks made to find traps while the spell is in effect. Note: Find Traps grants no ability to disable the traps that you may find.
TAG_SPELLS_FINGER_OF_DEATH:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] (Death)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 8, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One living creatureDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partialSpell Resistance: YesYou can slay any one living creature within range. The target is entitled to a Fortitude ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] to survive the attack. If the save is successful, the creature instead takes 3d6 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +25). The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds on its saving throw.
TAG_SPELLS_FIRE_SHIELD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_F: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire or Cold)Level: ~Domain: Fire~[TAG_FIRE_D] 5, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4, ~Domain: Sun~[TAG_SUN_D] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 round/level (D)This spell wreathes you in flames and causes damage to each creature that attacks you in melee. The flames also protect you from either cold-based or fire-based attacks (your choice). Any creature striking you with its body or a handheld weapon deals normal damage, but at the same time the attacker takes 1d6 point of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +15). This damage is either cold damage (if the shield protects against fire-based attacks) or fire damage (if the shield protects against cold-based attacks). If the attacker has ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE], it applies to this effect.  Creatures wielding weapons with exceptional reach, such as ~longspears~[TAG_WEAPONS_LONGSPEAR], are not subject to this damage if they attack you. Warm Shield:  The flames are warm to the touch. You only take half damage from cold-based attacks. If such an attack allows a ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] save for half damage, you take no damage on a successful save. Chill Shield:  The flames are cool to the touch. You only take half damage from fire-based attacks. If such an attack allows a Reflex save for half damage, you take no damage on a successful save.
TAG_SPELLS_FIRE_STORM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CL: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 8, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 7, ~Domain: Fire~[TAG_FIRE_D] 7Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: Two 10-ft. cubes per level (S)Duration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] halfSpell Resistance: YesWhen a fire storm spell is cast, the whole area is shot through with sheets of roaring flame. The raging flames do not harm natural vegetation or ground cover. Any creature within the area takes 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 20d6).
TAG_SPELLS_FIREBALL:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SORC: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: 20-ft. radius spreadDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] halfSpell Resistance: YesA Fireball spell is an explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals 1d6 points of fire damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 10d6) to every creature within that area. Unattended objects also take this damage. The explosion creates almost no pressure. You point your finger and determine the range (distance and height) at which the Fireball is to burst. A glowing pea-sized bead streaks from the pointing digit and, unless it impacts upon a material body or solid barrier prior to attaining the prescribed range, blossoms into the Fireball at that point.
TAG_SPELLS_FLAME_STRIKE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4, ~Domain: Sun~[TAG_SUN_D] 5, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: Cylinder (10-ft. radius, 40 ft. high)Duration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] halfSpell Resistance: YesA Flame Strike produces a vertical column of divine fire roaring downward. The spell deals 1d6 points of damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 15d6). Half the damage is fire damage, but the other half results directly from divine power and is therefore not subject to being reduced by resistance to fire-based attacks, such as that granted by ~Protection from Energy~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_ENERGY] (fire), ~Fire Shield~[TAG_SPELLS_FIRE_SHIELD] (Chill Shield), and similar magic.
TAG_SPELLS_FLARE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_0: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Light)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 0, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 0, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: Burst of light Duration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThis cantrip causes a light to burst directly in front of a single creature. That creature is ~dazzled~[TAG_DAZZLED] for 1 minute unless it makes a successful Fortitude save.  Sightless creatures, as well as creatures already dazzled, are not affected by Flare.
TAG_SPELLS_FOG_CLOUD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DRU: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2, ~Domain: Water~[TAG_WATER_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Effect: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. highDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoA bank of fog billows out from the point you designate. The fog obscures all sight beyond 5 feet. A creature within 5 feet has partial ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT] (attacks have a 20% miss chance). Creatures farther away have total concealment (50% miss chance, and the attacker can't use sight to locate the target).
TAG_SPELLS_FOX'S_CUNNING:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: YesThe transmuted creature becomes smarter. The spell grants a +4 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus to ~Intelligence~[TAG_INTELLIGENCE], adding the usual benefits to Intelligence-based ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS] and other uses of the Intelligence modifier. Wizards (and other spellcasters who rely on Intelligence) affected by this spell do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Intelligence, but the save DCs for spells they cast while under this spell's effect do increase. This spell doesn't grant extra ~skill points~[TAG_ACQUIRE_SKILLS].
TAG_SPELLS_FOX'S_CUNNING_MASS:TAG_SPELLS: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Fox's Cunning~[TAG_SPELLS_FOX'S_CUNNING], except that it affects multiple creatures.
TAG_SPELLS_FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT:TAG_SPELL: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4, ~Domain: Luck~[TAG_LUCK_D] 4, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Personal or touchTarget: You or creature touchedDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)This spell enables you or a creature you touch to move and attack normally for the duration of the spell, even while under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement, such as ~Solid Fog~[TAG_SPELLS_SOLID_FOG], ~Slow~[TAG_SPELLS_SLOW], and ~Web~[TAG_SPELLS_WEB]. The subject automatically succeeds on any ~grapple~[TAG_GRAPPLING] checks made to escape a grapple or a pin.
TAG_SPELLS_GASEOUS_FORM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Domain: Air~[TAG_AIR_D] 3, ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Willing corporeal creature touchedDuration: 2 min./level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThe subject and all its gear become insubstantial, misty, and translucent. Its material armor (including natural armor) becomes worthless, though its ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER], ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY], ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] bonuses, and armor bonuses from force effects (for example, from the ~Mage Armor~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGE_ARMOR] spell) still apply. The subject gains ~damage reduction~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_DAMAGE_REDUCTION] 10/magic (i.e., the target can absorb damage up to 10 points, unless it is magic damage) and becomes immune to ~poison~[TAG_POISON] and ~critical hits~[TAG_CRITICAL_HIT]. It can't attack or cast spells with verbal, somatic, or material components while in Gaseous Form. If it has a touch spell ready to use, that spell is discharged harmlessly when the Gaseous Form spell takes effect.
TAG_SPELLS_GENTLE_REPOSE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesYou preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay. In ToEE, when Gentle Repose is cast on a living creature, that creature will not decay upon its death.
TAG_SPELLS_GHOUL_TOUCH:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_S: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Living humanoid touchedDuration: 1d6+2 roundsSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesImbuing you with negative energy, this spell allows you to ~paralyze~[TAG_PARALYZED] a single living humanoid for the duration of the spell with a successful melee ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK]. Additionally, the paralyzed subject exudes a carrion stench that causes all living creatures (except you) within a 10-foot-radius to become ~sickened~[TAG_SICKENED] (Fortitude negates). A ~Neutralize Poison~[TAG_SPELLS_NEUTRALIZE_POISON] spell removes the effect from a sickened creature, and creatures immune to ~poison~[TAG_POISON] are unaffected by the stench.
TAG_SPELLS_GIANT_VERMIN:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One creatureDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesIn ToEE, this spell summons one monster and places it under control of the party. Within the game, you select a monster from the ~radial menu~[TAG_RADIAL_MENU] (displaying the three types of monsters) and it will be summoned.The monsters you can choose from are:~Black Widow Spider~[TAG_MONSTER_MONSTROUS_SPIDER_BLACK_WIDOW]~Giant Tick~[TAG_MONSTER_GIANT_TICK]~Large Spider~[TAG_MONSTER_MONSTROUS_SPIDER_LARGE]
TAG_SPELLS_GLIBNESS:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3Components: SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 10 min./level (D)Your speech becomes fluent and more believable. You gain a +30 bonus on ~Bluff~[TAG_BLUFF] checks made to convince another of the truth of your words. (This bonus doesn't apply to other uses of the Bluff skill, such as ~feinting~[TAG_FEINT] in combat, creating a diversion to hide, or communicating a hidden message via innuendo.)
TAG_SPELLS_GLITTERDUST:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_B: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: Creatures and objects within 10-ft.-radius spreadDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (blinding only)Spell Resistance: NoA cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED] and visibly outlining ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE] things for the duration of the spell. All within the area are covered by the dust, which cannot be removed and continues to sparkle until it fades. Any creature covered by the dust takes a -40 penalty on ~Hide~[TAG_HIDE] checks.
TAG_SPELLS_GLOBE_OF_INVULNERABILITY_LESS: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 10 ft.Area: 10-ft.-radius spherical emanation, centered on youDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoAn immobile, faintly shimmering magical sphere surrounds you and excludes all spell effects of 3rd level or lower. The area of effect of any such spells does not include the area of the Lesser Globe of Invulnerability. Such spells fail to affect any target located within the globe. Excluded efforts include ~spell-like abilities~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES] and spells or spell-like effects from items. However, any type of spell can be cast through or out of the magical globe. Spells of 4th level and higher are not affected by the globe, nor are spells already in effect when the globe is cast. The globe can be brought down by a targeted ~Dispel Magic~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC] spell, but not by an area Dispel Magic. You can leave and return to the globe without penalty. Note: Spell effects are not disrupted unless their effects enter the globe, and even then they are merely suppressed, not dispelled. For example, creatures inside the globe would still see a ~Mirror Image~[TAG_SPELLS_MIRROR_IMAGE] created by a caster outside the globe. If that caster then entered the globe, the images would wink out, only to reappear when the caster exited the globe.
TAG_SPELLS_GOOD_HOPE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BAR: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One living creature/level, no two which may be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)This spell instills powerful hope in the subjects. Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus on ~saving throws~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC], ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], ability checks, ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS], and weapon damage rolls. Good Hope counters and dispels ~Crushing Despair~[TAG_SPELLS_CRUSHING_DESPAIR].
TAG_SPELLS_GOODBERRY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DRU: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTargets: 2d4 fresh berries touchedDuration: One day/levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesIn ToEE, casting Goodberry creates 2d4 berries and moves them directly into your ~inventory~[TAG_HMU_CHAR_INVENTORY_UI]. Each berry cures 1 point of damage when eaten, subject to a maximum of 8 points of such curing in any 24-hour period.
TAG_SPELLS_GREASE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_1: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS] (Creation)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target or Area: One object or a 10-ft. squareDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: see textSpell Resistance: NoA Grease spell covers a solid surface with a layer of slippery grease. Any creature in the area when the spell is cast must make a successful ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] save or fall. This save is repeated on your turn each round that the creature remains within the area. Failure means it can't move that round (and must then make a Reflex save or fall).
TAG_SPELLS_GUIDANCE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLER: ~Divination~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DIVINATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 0, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 minute or until dischargedSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: YesThis spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance. The subject gets a +1 competence bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], ~saving throws~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC], or ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS]. Within the game, Guidance appears on the ~radial menu~[TAG_RADIAL_MENU], from which one can choose the type of bonus (either to attack rolls, saving throws, or skill checks). The competence bonus will then apply to the next occurrence of whatever event was selected.
TAG_SPELLS_GUST_OF_WIND:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Air)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Casting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 60 ft.Effect: Line-shaped burst of severe wind emanating out from you to the extreme of the rangeDuration: 1 roundSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThis spell creates a severe blast of air (approximately 50 mph) that originates from you and affects all creatures in its path. A Tiny or smaller creature on the ground is knocked down and rolled 1d4x10 feet, taking 1d4 points of ~nonlethal damage~[TAG_RADIAL_MENU_NONLETHAL_DAMAGE] per 10 feet. Small creatures are knocked ~prone~[TAG_PRONE] by the force of the wind. Medium creatures are unable to move forward against the force of the wind. Large or larger creatures may move normally within a Gust of Wind effect. A Gust of Wind can't move a creature beyond the limit of its range. Any creature, regardless of ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER], takes a -4 penalty on ~ranged attacks~[TAG_RANGED_ATTACKS] and ~Listen~[TAG_LISTEN] checks in the area of a Gust of Wind.
TAG_SPELLS_HALT_UNDEAD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_S: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Targets: Up to three undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (see text)Spell Resistance: YesThis spell renders as many as three undead creatures immobile. A nonintelligent undead creature (such as a skeleton or zombie) gets no ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC]; an intelligent undead creature does. If the spell is successful, it renders the undead creature immobile for the duration of the spell (similar to the effect of ~Hold Person~[TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON] on a living creature). The effect is broken if the halted creatures are attacked or take damage.
TAG_SPELLS_HARM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERIC_6: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6, ~Domain: Destruction~[TAG_DESTRUCTION_D] 6Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] half; see textSpell Resistance: YesHarm charges a subject with negative energy that deals 10 points of damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level). If the creature successfully saves, Harm deals half this amount, but it cannot reduce the target's ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] to less than 1. If used on an undead creature, Harm acts like ~Heal~[TAG_SPELLS_HEAL].
TAG_SPELLS_HASTE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_3: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)The transmuted creatures move and act more quickly than normal. This extra speed has several effects. When making a ~full attack~[TAG_FULL_ATTACK] action, a hasted creature may make one extra attack with any weapon it is holding. The attack is made using the creature's full ~base attack bonus~[TAG_LEVEL_BONUSES], plus any modifiers appropriate to the situation. (This effect is not cumulative with similar effects such as that provided by a weapon of speed, nor does it actually grant an extra action, so you can't use it to cast a second spell or otherwise take an extra action in the round.) A hasted creature gains a +1 bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and a +1 dodge bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] and ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] saves. Any condition that makes you lose your ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY] bonus to Armor Class (if any) also makes you lose dodge bonuses. All of the hasted creature's movements increase by 30 feet, to a maximum of twice the subject's normal speed. This increase counts as an ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus. Multiple Haste effects don't stack. Haste dispels and counters ~Slow~[TAG_SPELLS_SLOW].
TAG_SPELLS_HEAL:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERIC_6: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 7, ~Domain: Healing~[TAG_HEALING_D] 6Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions. It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: ~ability damage~[TAG_ABILITY_DAMAGED], ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED], ~confused~[TAG_CONFUSED], ~dazed~[TAG_DAZED], ~dazzled~[TAG_DAZZLED], ~deafened~[TAG_DEAFENED], ~diseased~[TAG_DISEASED], ~exhausted~[TAG_EXHAUSTED], ~fatigued~[TAG_FATIGUED], ~Feeblemind~[TAG_SPELLS_FEEBLEMIND], ~Insanity~[TAG_SPELLS_INSANITY], ~nauseated~[TAG_NAUSEATED], ~sickened~[TAG_SICKENED], ~stunned~[TAG_STUNNED], and ~poisoned~[TAG_POISON]. It also cures 10 ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] of damage per level of the caster, to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level. Heal does not remove ~negative levels~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_ENERGY_DRAIN_AND_NEGATIVE_LEVELS], restore permanently drained levels, or restore permanently drained ~ability score~[TAG_ABILITY_SCORES] points. If used against an undead creature, Heal instead acts like ~Harm~[TAG_SPELLS_HARM].
TAG_SPELLS_HEAL_MASS:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLE: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 9, ~Domain: Healing~[TAG_HEALING_D] 9Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Heal~[TAG_SPELLS_HEAL], except as noted above. The maximum number of ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] restored to each creature is 250.
TAG_SPELLS_HEAT_METAL:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DR: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION] (Fire)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Domain: Sun~[TAG_SUN_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: Metal equipment of one creature per two levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 7 roundsSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (object)Spell Resistance: Yes (object)Heat Metal makes metal extremely warm. Unattended, nonmagical metal gets no saving throw. Magical metal is allowed a ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] against the spell. An item in a creature's possession uses the creature's saving throw bonus unless its own is higher. In ToEE, only a creature wearing metal armor is affected by this spell. A creature takes fire damage if its equipment is heated. It takes full damage if its armor is affected. The creature takes minimum damage (1 point or 2 points) if it's not wearing metal armor. First round of the spell: The metal becomes warm and uncomfortable to touch but deals no damage. The same effect also occurs on the last round of the spell's duration. Second (and also the next-to-last) round: Intense heat causes pain and damage (1d4 points of damage). Third, fourth, and fifth rounds: The metal is searing hot, causing more damage (2d4 points of damage). Any cold intense enough to damage the creature negates fire damage from the spell (and vice versa) on a point-for-point basis. For example, if the damage roll from a Heat Metal spell indicates 2 points of fire damage and the subject is hit by a ~Ray of Frost~[TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_FROST] spell in the same round and takes 3 points of cold damage, the subject winds up taking no fire damage and only 1 point of cold damage. Heat Metal counters and dispels ~Chill Metal~[TAG_SPELLS_CHILL_METAL].
TAG_SPELLS_HEROES_FEAST:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 6, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6Components: V, SCasting Time: 10 minutesRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: Feast for one creature/levelDuration: 12 hoursSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoYou bring forth a great feast, including a magnificent table, chairs, service, and food and drink. The feast takes 1 hour to consume, and the beneficial effects do not set in until this hour is over. Every creature partaking of the feast is cured of all ~diseases~[TAG_DISEASED], ~sickness~[TAG_SICKENED], and ~nausea~[TAG_NAUSEATED]; becomes immune to ~poison~[TAG_POISON] for 12 hours; and gains 1d8 ~temporary hit points~[TAG_TEMPORARY_HIT_POINTS] +1 point per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +10) after imbibing the nectar-like beverage that is part of the feast. The ambrosial food that is consumed grants each creature that partakes a +1 morale bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and ~Will~[TAG_WILL] saves and immunity to ~fear~[TAG_FEAR] effects for 12 hours.
TAG_SPELLS_HEROISM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)This spell imbues a single creature with great bravery and morale in battle. The target gains a +2 morale bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], saves, and ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS].
TAG_SPELLS_HEROISM_GREATER:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 5, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6Duration: 1 min./levelThis spell functions like ~Heroism~[TAG_SPELLS_HEROISM], except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], saves, and ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS], immunity to ~fear~[TAG_FEAR] effects, and ~temporary hit points~[TAG_TEMPORARY_HIT_POINTS] equal to your ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 20).
TAG_SPELLS_HIDE_FROM_ANIMALS:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1Components: SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: One creature touched/levelDuration: 10 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: YesAnimals cannot see, hear, or smell the warded creatures. Animals simply act as though the warded creatures are not there. If a warded character touches an animal or attacks any creature, even with a spell, the spell ends for all recipients.
TAG_SPELLS_HIDE_FROM_UNDEAD:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTargets: One creature touched/levelDuration: 10 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless); see textSpell Resistance: YesUndead cannot see, hear, or smell the warded creatures. Nonintelligent undead creatures are automatically affected and act as though the warded creatures are not there. An intelligent undead creature gets a single Will saving throw. If it fails, the subject can't see any of the warded creatures. If a warded creature attempts to ~turn or rebuke~[TAG_TURN] undead, touches an undead creature, or attacks any creature (even with a spell), the spell ends for all recipients.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_ANIMAL:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_A: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Domain: Animal~[TAG_ANIMAL_D] 2, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 2Components: V, STarget: One animalThis spell functions like ~Hold Person~[TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON], except that it affects an animal instead of a humanoid.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_MONSTER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Domain: Law~[TAG_LAW_D] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, STarget: One living creatureThis spell functions like ~Hold Person~[TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON], except that it affects any living creature that fails its ~Will~[TAG_WILL] save.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_MONSTER_MASS:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 9Targets: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Hold Person~[TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON], except that it affects multiple creatures and holds any living creature that fails its ~Will~[TAG_WILL] save.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_B: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One humanoid creatureDuration: 1 round/level (D); see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesThe subject becomes ~paralyzed~[TAG_PARALYZED] and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any actions, even speech. Each round on its turn, the subject may attempt a new ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] to end the effect. (In ToEE, this is a ~full-round action~[TAG_FULL_ROUND_ACTION] that provokes ~attacks of opportunity~[TAG_AOO].)
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON_MASS:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7Targets: One or more humanoid creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Hold Person~[TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PERSON], except as noted above.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLD_PORTAL:TAG_DUMMY::#TAG_S: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Component: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One portal, up to 20 sq. ft./levelDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThis spell magically holds doors and gates shut.  The magic affects the portal just as if it were securely closed and normally locked.  A ~Knock~[TAG_SPELLS_KNOCK] spell or a successful ~Dispel Magic~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC] spell can negate a Hold Portal spell.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLY_SMITE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_GO: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Good)Level: ~Domain: Good~[TAG_GOOD_DOMAIN] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: 20-ft.-radius burstDuration: Instantaneous (1 round); see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] partial; see textSpell Resistance: YesYou draw down holy power to smite your enemies. Only evil and neutral creatures are harmed by the spell; good creatures are unaffected. The spell deals 1d8 points of damage per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 5d8) to each evil creature in the area (or 1d6 points of damage per caster level, maximum 10d6, to an evil outsider) and causes it to become ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED] for 1 round. A successful Will ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] reduces damage to half and negates the blinded effect. The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither good nor evil, and they are not blinded. Such a creature can reduce that damage by half (down to one-quarter of the roll) with a successful Will save.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLY_SWORD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_PA: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Good)Level: ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Melee weapon touchedDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThis spell allows you to channel holy power into your sword, or any other melee weapon you choose. Co8 Note: The spell creates a Paladin Holy Sword that is directly summoned into the paladin's ~inventory~[TAG_HMU_CHAR_INVENTORY_UI]. The weapon is a ~longsword~[TAG_WEAPONS_LONGSWORD] that grants the wielder a ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE] of 15. The weapon acts as a +5 ~holy~[TAG_HOLY] weapon (+5 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls, extra 2d6 damage against evil opponents). It also emits a ~Magic Circle against Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_EVIL] effect (as the spell). If the magic circle ends, the sword creates a new one on your turn as a ~free action~[TAG_FREE_ACTION]. The spell is automatically canceled 1 round after the weapon leaves your hand. You cannot have more than one Holy Sword at a time.
TAG_SPELLS_HOLY_WORD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_GOO: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Good, Sonic)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 7, ~Domain: Good~[TAG_GOOD_DOMAIN] 7Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 40 ft.Area: Nongood creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on youDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: None or ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesAny nongood creature within the area that hears the Holy Word suffers the following ill effects.HD                                        EffectEqual to ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL]      @t~Deafened~[TAG_DEAFENED]Up to caster level - 1     @t~Blinded~[TAG_BLINDED], deafenedUp to caster level - 5     @t~Paralyzed~[TAG_PARALYZED], blinded, deafenedUp to caster level - 10 @tKilled, paralyzed, blinded, deafened The effects are cumulative and concurrent. No ~saving throw~[TAG_SAVING_THROW_DESC] is allowed against these effects. Deafened     The creature is deafened for 1d4 rounds. Blinded     The creature is blinded for 2d4 rounds. Paralyzed     The creature is paralyzed and ~helpless~[TAG_HELPLESS] for 1d10 minutes. Killed     Living creatures die. Undead creatures are destroyed. Furthermore, if you are on your home plane when you cast this spell, nongood extraplanar creatures within the area are instantly banished back to their home planes. Creatures so banished cannot return for at least 24 hours. This effect takes place regardless of whether the creatures hear the Holy Word. The banishment effect allows a Will save (at a -4 penalty) to negate. Creatures whose HD exceed your caster level are unaffected by Holy Word.
TAG_SPELLS_HORRID_WILTING:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 8, ~Domain: Water~[TAG_WATER_D] 8Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Targets: Living creatures, no two of which can be more than 60 ft. apartDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] halfSpell Resistance: YesThis spell evaporates moisture from the body of each subject living creature, dealing 1d6 points of damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 20d6). This spell is especially devastating to Water ~Elementals~[TAG_MONSTER_ELEMENTAL] and plant creatures, which instead take 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d8).
TAG_SPELLS_ICE_STORM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DRU: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Cold)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4, ~Domain: Water~[TAG_WATER_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: Cylinder (20-ft. radius, 40 ft. high)Duration: 1 full roundSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesGreat magical hailstones pound down for 1 full round, dealing 3d6 points of bludgeoning damage and 2d6 points of cold damage to every creature in the area. A -4 penalty applies to each ~Listen~[TAG_LISTEN] check made within the Ice Storm's effect, and all land movement within its area is reduced to half speed. At the end of the duration, the hail disappears, leaving no aftereffects (other than the damage dealt).
TAG_SPELLS_IDENTIFY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD: ~Divination~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DIVINATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 1, ~Domain: Magic~[TAG_MAGIC_D] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, S, MCasting Time: 1 hourRange: TouchTargets: One touched objectDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThe spell determines all magic properties of a single ~magic item~[TAG_MAGIC_ITEMS], including how to activate those functions (if appropriate), and how many charges are left (if any). In ToEE, when Identify is cast, the spell will bring up your ~inventory~[TAG_HMU_CHAR_INVENTORY_UI], and you may select an item. All magical properties of the selected item will then be revealed. Arcane Material Component: A pearl of at least 100 gp value, crushed and stirred into wine with an owl feather; the infusion must be drunk prior to spellcasting.
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_CRITICAL_WOUNDS:TAG_S: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Domain: Destruction~[TAG_DESTRUCTION_D] 4This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS], except that you deal 4d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +20).
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_CRITICAL_WOUNDS_MASS:: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 8This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds, Mass~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS_MASS], except that it inflicts 4d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +40).
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS:TAG_SPEL: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Destruction~[TAG_DESTRUCTION_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] halfSpell Resistance: YesWhen laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5). Since undead are powered by negative energy, this spell cures such a creature of a like amount of damage, rather than harming it.
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS_MASS:TAG: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Domain: Destruction~[TAG_DESTRUCTION_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] halfSpell Resistance: YesNegative energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 1d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +25) to nearby living enemies. Like other inflict spells, Mass Inflict Light Wounds cures undead in its area rather than damaging them. A cleric capable of spontaneously casting inflict spells can also spontaneously cast mass inflict spells.
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_MINOR_WOUNDS:TAG_SPEL: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 0Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesThis spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS], except that you deal 1 point of damage and a Will save negates the damage instead of halving it.
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_MODERATE_WOUNDS:TAG_S: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS], except that you deal 2d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +10).
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_MODERATE_WOUNDS_MASS:: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds, Mass~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS_MASS], except that it inflicts 2d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +30).
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_SERIOUS_WOUNDS:TAG_SP: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS], except that you deal 3d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +15).
TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_SERIOUS_WOUNDS_MASS:T: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 7This spell functions like ~Inflict Light Wounds, Mass~[TAG_SPELLS_INFLICT_LIGHT_WOUNDS_MASS], except that it inflicts 3d8 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +35).
TAG_SPELLS_INSANITY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SORC: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS] 7, ~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One living creatureDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThe affected creature suffers from a continuous ~Confusion~[TAG_SPELLS_CONFUSION] effect, as the spell. ~Remove Curse~[TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_CURSE] does not remove Insanity. ~Heal~[TAG_SPELLS_HEAL] can restore the creature.
TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2, ~Domain: Trickery~[TAG_TRICKERY_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Personal or touchTarget: You or a creatureDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)The creature touched becomes ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE], vanishing from sight. If the recipient is a creature carrying gear, that vanishes, too. If you cast the spell on someone else, neither you nor your allies can see the subject, unless you can normally see invisible things or you employ magic to do so. Items dropped or put down by an invisible creature become visible; items picked up disappear if tucked into the clothing or pouches worn by the creature. Any part of an item that the subject carries but that extends more than 10 feet from it becomes visible, such as a trailing rope. Of course, the subject is not magically silenced, and certain other conditions can render the recipient detectable (such as stepping in a puddle). The spell ends if the subject attacks any creature. For purposes of this spell, an attack includes spells targeting a foe or whose areas of effect include a foe. Causing harm indirectly is not an attack.     Spells such as ~Bless~[TAG_SPELLS_BLESS] that specifically affect allies but not foes are not attacks for this purpose, even when they include foes in their area of effect. An invisible being can open doors, talk, summon monsters, remotely trigger traps, and so forth. There are certain modifiers which affect Invisibility in combat, such as the following: The invisible Attacker:  +2 bonus to ~melee attacks~[TAG_MELEE_ATTACKS] and +2 bonus to ~ranged attacks~[TAG_RANGED_ATTACKS] The Defender:  - Loses any ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY] bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] and loses any dodge bonuses.     However, if the Defender is ~blind~[TAG_BLINDED] the bonuses are not lost.  - Has a 50% miss chance because the Attacker is in total ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT].
TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY_GREATER:TAG_SPEL: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, STarget: You or creature touchedDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)This spell functions like ~Invisibility~[TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY], except that it doesn't end if the subject attacks.
TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY_PURGE:TAG_SPELLS: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./level (D)You surround yourself with a sphere of power with a radius of 5 feet per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] that negates all forms of ~invisibility~[TAG_INVISIBLE]. Anything invisible becomes visible while in the area.
TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY_SPHERE:TAG_SPELL: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SArea: 10-ft.-radius emanation around the creature or object touchedThis spell functions like ~Invisibility~[TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY], except that this spell confers ~invisibility~[TAG_INVISIBLE] upon all creatures within 10 feet of the recipient. The center of the effect is mobile with the recipient. Those affected by this spell can see each other and themselves as if unaffected by the spell. Any affected creature moving out of the area becomes visible, but creatures moving into the area after the spell is cast do not become invisible. Affected creatures (other than the recipient) who attack negate the invisibility only for themselves. If the spell recipient attacks, the Invisibility Sphere ends.
TAG_SPELLS_KEEN_EDGE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SOR: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One weapon or fifty projectiles, all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of castingDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object]Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)This spell makes a weapon magically ~keen~[TAG_KEEN], improving its ability to deal telling blows. This transmutation doubles the threat range of the weapon. A threat range of 20 becomes 19-20, a threat range of 19-20 becomes 17-20, and a threat range of 18-20 becomes 15-20. The spell can be cast only on piercing or slashing weapons. If cast on ~arrows~[TAG_WEAPONS_ARROWS] or ~crossbow bolts~[TAG_WEAPONS_BOLTS], the Keen Edge on a particular projectile ends after one use, whether or not the missile strikes its target. (Treat ~shuriken~[TAG_WEAPONS_SHURIKEN] as arrows, rather than as ~thrown weapons~[TAG_THROW_WEAPON], for the purpose of this spell.) Multiple effects that increase a weapon's threat range (such as the Keen Edge spell and the ~Improved Critical~[TAG_IMPROVED_CRITICAL] feat) don't stack. You can't cast this spell on a natural weapon, such as a claw.
TAG_SPELLS_KNOCK:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SORCERE: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One door, box, or chest with an area of up to 10 sq. ft./levelDuration: Instantaneous; see textSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThe Knock spell opens stuck, barred, locked, or held doors. It opens secret doors, as well as locked or trick-opening boxes or chests. It also loosens welds, shackles, or chains (provided they serve to hold closures shut). The door does not relock itself or become stuck again on its own.
TAG_SPELLS_LIGHTNING_BOLT:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Electricity)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 120 ft.Area: 120-ft. lineDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] halfSpell Resistance: YesYou release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals 1d6 points of electricity damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 10d6) to each creature within its area. The bolt begins at your fingertips. The Lightning Bolt sets fire to combustibles and damages objects in its path. It can melt some metals. Lightning Bolt does not break through walls or barriers.
TAG_SPELLS_LONGSTRIDER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_D: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1, ~Domain: Travel~[TAG_TRAVEL_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 hour/level (D)This spell increases your base land speed by 10 feet. (This adjustment counts as an ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus.)
TAG_SPELLS_MAGE_ARMOR:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SO: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation) ForceLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 hour/level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: NoAn invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a Mage Armor spell, providing a +4 ~armor~[TAG_ARMOR_BONUS] bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS]. Unlike regular armor, Mage Armor entails no armor check penalty, ~arcane spell failure~[TAG_ARCANE_SPELL_FAILURE] chance, or speed reduction.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_CHAOS:TA: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Lawful)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Domain: Law~[TAG_LAW_D] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3This spell functions like ~Magic Circle against Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_EVIL], except that it is similar to ~Protection from Chaos~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_CHAOS] instead of ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], and it can imprison a nonlawful called creature.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_EVIL:TAG: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Good)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Domain: Good~[TAG_GOOD_DOMAIN] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchArea: 10-ft.-radius emanation from touched creatureDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: No; see textIn ToEE, Magic Circle against Evil can be cast two ways--with the magic circle inward or the magic circle outward. When Magic Circle is cast on the spellcaster or a friendly creature, the spell is considered to be focused outward. All creatures within the area gain the effects of a ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], and no nongood summoned or conjured creatures can enter the area either. You must overcome a creature's ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE] in order to keep it at bay, but the ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] and resistance bonuses and the protection from mental control apply regardless of enemies' spell resistance. When Magic Circle is cast on a hostile creature, the spell is considered to be focused inward. In this case, the spell binds a nongood called creature and causes the creature to become immobile, provided that you cast the spell that calls the creature within 1 round of casting the Magic Circle. In the game, casting the spell against a hostile creature results in the circle being considered inward. Likewise, in ToEE, the creature cannot cross the circle's boundaries unless it succeeds at a spell resistance check, at which point it is allowed to move. If the Magic Circle is cast against a friendly creature, the spell/circle is defined as inward.     The creature trapped within the circle can do nothing that directly or indirectly disturbs the circle, but other creatures can. A creature capable of casting ~Dimension Door~[TAG_SPELLS_DIMENSION_DOOR] can simply leave the circle through means of that spell. You can prevent the creature's extradimensional escape by casting a ~Dimension Anchor~[TAG_SPELLS_DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR] spell on it, but you must act before the creature acts. The creature cannot reach across the magic circle, but its ~ranged attacks~[TAG_RANGED_ATTACKS] (ranged weapons, spells, magical abilities, and the like) can. This spell is not cumulative with Protection from Evil and vice versa.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_GOOD:TAG: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Evil)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Domain: Evil~[TAG_EVIL_D] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3This spell functions like ~Magic Circle against Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_EVIL], except that it is similar to ~Protection from Good~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_GOOD] instead of ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], and it can imprison a nonevil called creature.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_LAW:TAG_: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS] (Chaotic)Level: ~Domain: Chaos~[TAG_CHAOS_D] 3, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3This spell functions like ~Magic Circle against Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_CIRCLE_AGAINST_EVIL], except that it is similar to ~Protection from Law~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_LAW] instead of ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], and it can imprison a nonchaotic called creature.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_FANG:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DR: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Living creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Magic Fang gives one natural weapon of the subject a +1 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls. The spell can affect a slam attack, fist, bite, or other natural weapon. (The spell does not change an ~unarmed strike's~[TAG_WEAPONS_STRIKE_UNARMED] damage from ~nonlethal damage~[TAG_RADIAL_MENU_NONLETHAL_DAMAGE] to lethal damage.)
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_FANG_GREATER:TAG_SPELLS: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 3Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One living creatureDuration: 1 hour/levelThis spell functions like ~Magic Fang~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_FANG], except that the ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on attack and damage rolls is +1 per four ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5).
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_MISSILE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Force)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Targets: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apartDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing 1d4+1 points of force damage.     The missile strikes unerringly, even if the target is in melee combat or has less than total ~cover~[TAG_COVER] or total ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT]. Specific parts of a creature can't be singled out. Inanimate objects are not damaged by the spell. For every two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] beyond 1st, you gain an additional missile:                    @tTwo at 3rd level                    @tThree at 5th level                    @tFour at 7th level                    @tFive at 9th level (the maximum number of missiles) If you shoot multiple missiles, you can have them strike a single creature or several creatures. A single missile can only strike one creature. You must designate targets before you check for ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE] or roll damage.
