TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_STONE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_C: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Domain: Earth~[TAG_EARTH_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTargets: Up to three pebbles touchedDuration: 30 minutes or until dischargedSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)You transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than ~sling bullets~[TAG_WEAPONS_BULLETS_SLING], so that they strike with great force when thrown. When hurled, they have a range increment of 20 feet. The spell gives them a +1 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls. The user of the stones makes a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK]. Each stone that hits deals 1d6+1 points of damage (including the spell's enhancement bonus), or 2d6+2 points against undead.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_VESTMENT:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Domain: Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH_D] 3, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Armor or shield touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)You imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus of +1 per four ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5 at 20th level). An outfit of regular clothing counts as armor that grants no ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] bonus for the purpose of this spell.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_WEAPON:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Weapon touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)Magic Weapon gives a weapon a +1 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls. (An enhancement bonus does not stack with a ~masterwork~[TAG_MASTERWORK] weapon's +1 bonus on attack rolls.) You can't cast this spell on a natural weapon, such as an ~unarmed strike~[TAG_WEAPONS_STRIKE_UNARMED] (instead, see ~Magic Fang~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_FANG]). A ~monk's~[TAG_MONKS] unarmed strike is considered a weapon, and thus it can be enhanced by this spell.
TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_WEAPON_GREATER:TAG_SPEL: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One weapon or fifty projectiles (all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of casting)Duration: 1 hour/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)This spell functions like ~Magic Weapon~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_WEAPON], except that it gives a weapon an ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls of +1 per four ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5). Alternatively, you can affect as many as fifty ~arrows~[TAG_WEAPONS_ARROWS], ~bolts~[TAG_WEAPONS_BOLTS], or ~bullets~[TAG_WEAPONS_BULLETS_SLING]. The projectiles must be of the same kind, and they have to be together (in the same quiver or other container). Projectiles, but not ~thrown weapons~[TAG_THROW_WEAPON], lose their transmutation when used. (Treat ~shuriken~[TAG_WEAPONS_SHURIKEN] as projectiles, rather than as thrown weapons, for the purpose of this spell.)
TAG_SPELLS_MELD_INTO_STONE:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION] (Earth)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 10 min./levelMeld into Stone enables you to meld your body and possessions into a single block of stone. While in the stone, you remain in contact, however tenuous, with the face of the stone through which you melded. You remain aware of the passage of time, but you cannot take any actions while hiding in the stone. Any damage to the stone does not harm you. Any time before the duration expires, you can step out of the stone through the surface that you entered.
TAG_SPELLS_MELF'S_ACID_ARROW:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation) AcidLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Effect: One arrow of acidDuration: 1 round + 1 round per three levelsSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoA magical arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target. You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to hit your target. The arrow deals 2d4 points of acid damage with no splash damage. For every three ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (to a maximum of 18th), the acid, unless somehow neutralized, lasts for another round, dealing another 2d4 points of damage in that round.
TAG_SPELLS_METEOR_SWARM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 9Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: Four 40-ft.-radius spreads; see textDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: None or ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] half; see textSpell Resistance: YesMeteor swarm is a very powerful and spectacular spell that is similar to ~fireball~[TAG_SPELLS_FIREBALL] in many aspects. When you cast it, four 2-foot-diameter spheres spring from your outstretched hand and streak in straight lines to the spots you select. The meteor spheres leave a fiery trail of sparks. If you aim a sphere at a specific creature, you may make a ranged touch attack to strike the target with the meteor. Any creature struck by one of these spheres takes 2d6 points of bludgeoning damage (no save) and receives no saving throw against the sphere's fire damage (see below). If a targeted sphere misses its target, it simply explodes at the nearest corner of the target's space. You may aim more than one meteor at the same target. Once a sphere reaches its destination, it explodes in a 40-foot-radius spread, dealing 6d6 points of fire damage to each creature in the area. If a creature is within the area of more than one sphere, it must save separately against each. (Fire resistance applies to each sphere's damage individually.)
TAG_SPELLS_MIND_FOG:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 5, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Effect: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. highDuration: 30 minutes and 2d6 rounds; see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesMind Fog produces a bank of thin mist that weakens the mental resistance of those caught in it. Creatures in the Mind Fog take a -10 competence penalty on ~Wisdom~[TAG_WISDOM] checks and Will saves. (A creature that successfully saves against the fog is not affected and need not make further saves even if it remains in the fog.) Affected creatures take the penalty as long as they remain in the fog and for 2d6 rounds thereafter. The fog is stationary and lasts for 30 minutes (or until dispersed by wind). The fog is thin and does not significantly hamper vision.
TAG_SPELLS_MIRACLE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERI: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 9, ~Domain: Luck~[TAG_LUCK_D] 9Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: See textTarget: See textDuration: See textSaving Throw: See textSpell Resistance: YesYou don't so much cast a Miracle as request one. You state what you would like to have happen and request that your ~deity~[TAG_RELIGION] (or the power you pray to for spells) intercede. Co8 Note: A Miracle can do only the following thing.     Miracle raises one dead creature per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL], no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart, fully healed. This spell functions like ~Raise Dead~[TAG_SPELLS_RAISE_DEAD], except the creature is immediately restored to full ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS], vigor, and health, with no loss of ~level~[TAG_LEVEL_LOSS] (or ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] points).
TAG_SPELLS_MIRROR_IMAGE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Figment)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Personal; see textTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./level (D)Several illusory duplicates of you pop into being, making it difficult for enemies to know which target to attack. The figments stay near and disappear when struck. Mirror Image creates 1d4 images plus one image per three ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 8 images total). Enemies attempting to target you with an attack (including spells) have a chance to hit one of the images instead. This chance is determined randomly and any successful attack against an image destroys it. An image's ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] is 10 + your size modifier + your ~Dex~[TAG_DEXTERITY] modifier. An attacker must be able to see the images to be fooled. If you are ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE] or an attacker shuts his or her eyes, the spell has no effect. (Being unable to see carries the same penalties as being ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED].)
TAG_SPELLS_MISLEAD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Figment, Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 5, ~Domain: Luck~[TAG_LUCK_D] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6, ~Domain: Trickery~[TAG_TRICKERY_D] 6Components: SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 round/levelYou become ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE] (as ~Greater Invisibility~[TAG_SPELLS_INVISIBILITY_GREATER], a glamer), and at the same time, several illusory images of you (as ~Mirror Image~[TAG_SPELLS_MIRROR_IMAGE], a figment) appear. Mislead creates one image per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL].
TAG_SPELLS_MODIFY_MEMORY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One living creatureDuration: PermanentSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesYou reach into the subject's mind and modify as many as 5 minutes of its memories in one of the following ways.Co8 Note: Modify Memory has the following effects on a target.  - The target does not become hostile and attack you on sight.  - Your ~reputation~[TAG_HMU_LOGBOOK_UI_REPUTATIONS] with the target is increased.  - The target does not notice you for 5 minutes.  - The target is given -8 on ~Spot~[TAG_SPOT] and ~Listen~[TAG_LISTEN] skill checks for 5 minutes. A successful saving throw does not cause the target to attack you, but does put them on the alert (+4 on Spot and Listen skill checks) for 5 minutes. A modified memory does not necessarily affect the subject's actions, particularly if it contradicts the creature's natural inclinations. An illogical modified memory is dismissed by the creature as a bad dream or a memory muddied by too much wine.
TAG_SPELLS_MORDENKAINEN'S_FAITHFUL_HOUND: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 5Components: V, S Casting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: Phantom watchdogDuration: 1 hour/~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] or until discharged, then 1 round/caster level; see textSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoYou conjure up a phantom watchdog that is ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE] to everyone but yourself. It then guards the area where it was conjured (it does not move). The hound immediately starts barking loudly if any Small or larger creature approaches within 30 feet of it. If an intruder approaches to within 5 feet of the hound, the dog stops barking and delivers a vicious bite (+10 attack bonus, 2d6+3 points of piercing damage) once per round. The dog also gets the bonuses appropriate for an invisible creature. The dog is considered ready to bite intruders, so it delivers its first bite on the intruder's turn. Its bite is the equivalent of a magic weapon for the purpose of ~damage reduction~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_DAMAGE_REDUCTION]. The hound cannot be attacked, but it can be dispelled. The spells lasts for 1 hour per caster level, but once the hound begins barking, it lasts only 1 round per caster level.
TAG_SPELLS_MORDENKAINEN'S_PRIVATE_SANCTU: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: NoneAllows safe resting in otherwise hostile environments.
TAG_SPELLS_MORDENKAINEN'S_SWORD:TAG_SPEL: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Force)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7Components: V, S, FCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: One swordDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThis spell brings into being a shimmering, swordlike plane of force. The sword strikes at any opponent within its range, as you desire, starting in the round that you cast the spell. The sword attacks its designated target once each round on your turn. Its attack bonus is equal to your ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] + your ~Int~[TAG_INTELLIGENCE] bonus or your ~Cha~[TAG_CHARISMA] bonus (for wizards or sorcerers, respectively) with an additional +3 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus. As a force effect, it can strike ethereal and incorporeal creatures. It deals 4d6+3 points of force damage, with a threat range of 19-20 and a critical multiplier of x2. Co8 Note: The sword has been given finite HP and may be attacked by opponents, since the AI can't tell it's invulnerable. Focus: A miniature platinum sword with a grip and pommel of copper and zinc. It costs 250 gp to construct.
TAG_SPELLS_NEGATIVE_ENERGY_PROTECTION:TA: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Living creature touchedDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)The warded creature gains partial protection from undead creatures who use negative energy and certain weapons and spells that drain energy levels. The Negative Energy Protection spell uses positive energy, which can offset the effects of a negative energy attack. Each time the warded creature is struck by a negative energy attack that drains levels or ~ability scores~[TAG_ABILITY_SCORES], it rolls 1d20 + ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] against a DC of 11 + the attacker's HD. If the warded creature succeeds, the energies cancel. The warded creature takes only ~hit point~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] damage from the attack and does not suffer any drain of experience levels or ability scores, regardless of the number of levels or ability score points the attack would have drained. An attacking undead creature takes 2d6 points of damage from the positive energy. An attacking caster or weapon receives no damage. If the warded creature does not succeed, the negative energy attack deals its normal damage. An attacking undead creature in such a situation does not take any positive energy damage.
TAG_SPELLS_NEUTRALIZE_POISON:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 4, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature or object of up to 1 cu. ft./level touchedDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless, object)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless, object)You detoxify any sort of venom in the creature or object touched. A ~poisoned~[TAG_POISON] creature suffers no additional effects from the poison, and any temporary effects are ended, but the spell does not reverse instantaneous effects, such as ~hit point~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] damage, temporary ~ability damage~[TAG_ABILITY_DAMAGED], or effects that don't go away on their own. For example, if a poison has dealt 3 points of ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] damage to a character and threatens to deal more damage later, this spell prevents the future damage but does not repair the damage already done. The creature is immune to any poison it is exposed to during the duration of the spell. Unlike with ~Delay Poison~[TAG_SPELLS_DELAY_POISON], such effects aren't postponed until after the duration--the creature need not make any saves against poison effects applied to it during the length of the spell. This spell can instead neutralize the poison in a poisonous creature or object for the duration of the spell, at the caster's option.
TAG_SPELLS_OBSCURING_MIST:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Domain: Air~[TAG_AIR_D] 1, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1, ~Domain: Water~[TAG_WATER_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 20 ft.Effect: Cloud spreads in 20-ft.-radius from you, 20 ft. highDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoA misty vapor arises around you. It is stationary once created. The vapor obscures all sight beyond 5 feet. A creature 5 feet away has partial ~concealment~[TAG_CONCEALMENT] (attacks have a 20% miss chance). Creatures farther away have total concealment (50% miss chance, and the attacker cannot use sight to locate the target).
TAG_SPELLS_OPEN_CLOSE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BA: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 0, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: Object or portal that can be opened or closedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (object)Spell Resistance: Yes (object)You can open an object, such as a chest or container, as well as doors and portals. Typically, the spell is used to open locked doors. It will not open doors that have been magically locked.
TAG_SPELLS_ORDER'S_WRATH:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Lawful)Level: ~Domain: Law~[TAG_LAW_D] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: Nonlawful creatures within a burst that fills a 30-ft. cubeDuration: Instantaneous (1 round); see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] partial; see textSpell Resistance: YesYou channel lawful power to smite enemies. The power takes the form of a three-dimensional grid of energy. Only chaotic and neutral (not lawful) creatures are harmed by the spell. The spell deals 1d8 points of damage per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 5d8) to chaotic creatures (or 1d6 points of damage per caster level, maximum 10d6, to chaotic outsiders) and causes them to be ~dazed~[TAG_DAZED] for one round. A successful Will save reduces the damage to half and negates the daze effect. The spell deals only half damage to creatures who are neither chaotic nor lawful, and they are not dazed. They can reduce the damage in half again (down to one-quarter of the roll) with a successful Will save.
TAG_SPELLS_OTILUKE'S_RESILIENT_SPHERE:TA: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Force)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: 1-ft.-diameter/level sphere, centered around a creatureDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] negatesSpell Resistance: YesA globe of shimmering force encloses a creature, provided the creature is small enough to fit within the diameter of the sphere. The sphere contains its subject for the spell's duration. The sphere is not subject to damage of any sort except from a ~Disintegrate~[TAG_SPELLS_DISINTEGRATE] spell, a targeted ~Dispel Magic~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC] spell, or a ~Rod of Negation~[TAG_WEAPONS_ROD_OF_NEGATION]. These effects destroy the sphere without harm to the subject. Nothing can pass through the sphere, inside or out, though the subject can breathe normally. The subject may struggle, but the sphere cannot be physically moved either by the people outside it or by the struggles of those within.
TAG_SPELLS_OWL'S_WISDOM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 2, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: YesThe transmuted creature becomes wiser. The spell grants a +4 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus to ~Wisdom~[TAG_WISDOM], adding the usual benefits to Wisdom-related skills. Clerics, druids, paladins, and rangers (and other Wisdom-based spellcasters) who receive Owl's Wisdom do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Wisdom, but the save DCs for their spells increase.
TAG_SPELLS_OWL'S_WISDOM_MASS:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 6, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 6, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 6Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartThis spell functions like ~Owl's Wisdom~[TAG_SPELLS_OWL'S_WISDOM], except that it affects multiple creatures.
TAG_SPELLS_PHANTASMAL_KILLER:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Phantasm) Fear, Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Target: One living creatureDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] disbelief (if interacted with), then ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partial; see textSpell Resistance: YesYou create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from ~fear~[TAG_FEAR]. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
TAG_SPELLS_POISON:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERIC: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Living creature touchedDuration: Instantaneous; see textSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesCalling upon the venomous powers of natural predators, you infect the subject with a horrible ~poison~[TAG_POISON] by making a successful melee ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK]. The poison deals 1d10 points of temporary ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] damage immediately and another 1d10 points of temporary Constitution damage 1 minute later. Each instance of damage can be negated by a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 your ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] + your ~Wis~[TAG_WISDOM] modifier).
TAG_SPELLS_POLAR_RAY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SOR: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Cold)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 8Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: RayDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA blue-white ray of freezing air and ice springs from your hand. You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] with the ray to deal damage to a target. The ray deals 1d6 points of cold damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 25d6).
TAG_SPELLS_POWER_WORD_BLIND:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 7Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One creature with 200 hp or lessDuration: See textSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou utter a single word of power that causes one creature of your choice to become ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED], whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the spell depends on the target's current ~hit point~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] total. Any creature that currently has 201 or more hit points is unaffected by Power Word Blind.Hit Points      Duration50 or less      Permanent51 - 100          1d4+1 minutes101 - 200       1d4+1 rounds
TAG_SPELLS_POWER_WORD_KILL:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Death, Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 9, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 9Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One living creature with 100 hp or lessDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou utter a single word of power that instantly kills one creature of your choice, whether the creature can hear the word or not. Any creature that currently has 101 or more ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] is unaffected by Power Word Kill.
TAG_SPELLS_POWER_WORD_STUN:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 8, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 8Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One creature with 150 hp or lessDuration: See textSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou utter a single word of power that causes one creature of your choice to become ~stunned~[TAG_STUNNED], whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the spell depends on the target's current ~hit point~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] total. Any creature that currently has 151 or more hit points is unaffected by Power Word Stun.Hit Points      Duration50 or less      4d4 rounds51 - 100          2d4 rounds101 - 150         1d4 rounds
TAG_SPELLS_PRAYER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLERIC: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 40 ft.Area: All allies and foes within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on youDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies. You and each of your allies gain a +1 luck bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], weapon damage rolls, saves, and ~skill checks~[TAG_USING_SKILLS], while each of your foes takes a -1 penalty on such rolls.
TAG_SPELLS_PRISMATIC_SPRAY:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 7Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 60 ft.Area: Cone-shaped burstDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: See textSpell Resistance: YesThis spell causes seven shimmering, intertwined, multicolored beams of light to spray from your hand. Each beam has a different power. Creatures in the area of the spell with 8 HD or less are automatically ~blinded~[TAG_BLINDED] for 2d4 rounds. Every creature in the area is randomly struck by one or more beams, which have additional effects. A 1d8 roll selects one of the following effects.               Color                 of  1d8      Beam         Effect@t1       @tRed          @t20 points fire damage (~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] half)@t2       @tOrange     @t40 points acid damage (Reflex half)@t3       @tYellow       @t80 points electricity damage (Reflex half)@t4       @tGreen        @t~Poison~[TAG_POISON] (Kills; ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partial, takes 1d6                                     points of ~Con~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] damage instead)@t5       @tBlue         @tTurned to stone (Fortitude negates)@t6       @tIndigo     @tInsane, as ~Insanity~[TAG_SPELLS_INSANITY] spell (~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates)@t7       @tViolet       @tSent to another plane (Will negates;                                     Co8 Note: target destroyed)@t8                        @tUpon rolling an 8, two effects are inflicted.
TAG_SPELLS_PRODUCE_FLAME:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1, ~Domain: Fire~[TAG_FIRE_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 0 ft.Effect: Flame in your palmDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesFlames as bright as a torch appear in your open hand. The flames harm neither you nor your equipment. In addition to providing illumination, the flames can be hurled or used to touch enemies. You can strike an opponent with a melee ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK], dealing fire damage equal to 1d6 + 1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5). Alternatively, you can hurl the flames up to 120 feet as a ~thrown weapon~[TAG_THROW_WEAPON]. When doing so, you attack with a ranged touch attack (with no ~range penalty~[TAG_RANGE_PENALTY]) and deal the same damage as with the melee attack. No sooner do you hurl the flames than a new set appears in your hand. Each attack you make reduces the remaining duration by 1 minute. If an attack reduces the remaining duration to 0 minutes or less, the spell ends after the attack resolves.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_ARROWS:TAG_SP: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 hour/level or until dischargedSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)The warded creature gains resistance to ranged weapons. The subject gains ~damage reduction~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_DAMAGE_REDUCTION] 10/magic against ranged weapons. (This spell doesn't grant you the ability to damage creatures with similar damage reduction.) Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 100 points), it is discharged.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_CHAOS:TAG_SPE: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Lawful)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Law~[TAG_LAW_D] 1, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1This spells functions like ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], except that the ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] and resistance bonuses apply to attacks from chaotic creatures, and chaotic summoned or conjured creatures cannot touch the subject.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_ENERGY:TAG_SP: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Domain: Luck~[TAG_LUCK_D] 3, ~Domain: Protection~[TAG_PROTECTION_D] 3, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 10 min./or until dischargedSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Protection from Energy grants temporary immunity to the type of energy you specify when you cast it (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). When the spell absorbs 12 points per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] of energy damage (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is discharged. Note: Protection from Energy overlaps (and does not stack with) ~Resist Energy~[TAG_SPELLS_RESIST_ENERGY]. If a character is warded by Protection from Energy and Resist Energy, the protection spell absorbs damage until its power is exhausted.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL:TAG_SPEL: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Good)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Good~[TAG_GOOD_DOMAIN] 1, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./level (D) Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: No; see textThis spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures. It creates a magical barrier around the subject at a distance of 1 foot. The barrier moves with the subject and has three major effects. First, the subject gains a +2 ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] and a +2 resistance bonus on saves. Both of these bonuses apply against attacks made or effects created by evil creatures. Second, the barrier blocks any attempt to possess the warded creature or to exercise mental control over the creature (including ~enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (charm) effects and enchantment (compulsion) effects that grant the caster ongoing control over the subject, such as ~Dominate Person~[TAG_SPELLS_DOMINATE_PERSON]). The protection does not prevent such effects from targeting the protected creature, but it suppresses the effect for the duration of the Protection from Evil effect. If the Protection from Evil effect ends before the effect granting mental control does, the would-be controller would then be able to mentally command the controlled creature. This second effect works regardless of alignment. Third, the spell prevents bodily contact by summoned creatures. This causes the natural weapon attacks of such creatures to fail and the creatures to recoil if such attacks require touching the warded creature. Good summoned creatures are immune to this effect. The protection against contact by summoned creatures ends if the warded creature makes an attack against or tries to force the barrier against the blocked creature. ~Spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE] can allow a creature to overcome this protection and touch the warded creature.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_GOOD:TAG_SPEL: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS] (Evil)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Evil~[TAG_EVIL_D] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1This spell functions like ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], except that the ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] and resistance bonuses apply to attacks from good creatures, and good summoned or conjured creatures cannot touch the subject.
TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_LAW:TAG_SPELL: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Chaotic)Level: ~Domain: Chaos~[TAG_CHAOS_D] 1, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1This spell functions like ~Protection from Evil~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_EVIL], except that the ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] and resistance bonuses apply to attacks from lawful creatures, and lawful summoned or conjured creatures cannot touch the subject.
TAG_SPELLS_QUENCH:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DRUID_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area or Target: One 20-ft. cube/level (S)Duration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoEach Fire ~Elemental~[TAG_MONSTER_ELEMENTAL] creature within the area of a Quench spell takes 1d6 points of damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 15d6, no save allowed).
TAG_SPELLS_RAGE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_2 T: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Targets: One willing living creature per three levels, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: ~Concentration~[TAG_CONCENTRATION] + 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesEach affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus to ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH] and ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION], a +1 morale bonus on ~Will~[TAG_WILL] saves, and a -2 penalty to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS]. The effect is otherwise identical to a ~barbarian's rage~[TAG_CLASS_FEATURES_BARBARIAN_RAGE], except that the subjects aren't ~fatigued~[TAG_FATIGUED] at the end of the rage.
TAG_SPELLS_RAISE_DEAD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CL: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5Components: V, S, MCasting Time: 1 minuteRange: TouchTarget: Dead creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: None; see textSpell Resistance: Yes (harmless)You restore life to a deceased creature. You can raise a creature that has been dead for no longer than one day per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL]. In addition, the subject's soul must be free and willing to return. If the subject is a hostile creature, they get a ~Will~[TAG_WILL] save to determine if their soul will resist returning or not. If the subject is an ally and is willing, there is no saving throw. Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. In ToEE, Raise Dead causes the player character to lose ~XP~[TAG_EXPERIENCE_AND_LEVELS] when experiencing ~Level Loss~[TAG_LEVEL_LOSS] which occurs as a result of being raised. If the subject is 1st level, it loses 2 points of ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] instead. This level loss or Constitution loss cannot be repaired by any means. A character who died with spells prepared has a 50% chance of losing any given spell upon being raised, in addition to losing spells for losing a level. A spellcasting creature that doesn't prepare spells (such as a ~sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]) has a 50% chance of losing any given unused spell slot as if it had been used to cast a spell, in addition to losing spell slots for losing a level. A raised creature has a number of ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS] equal to its current Hit Dice. Any ability scores damaged to 0 are raised to 1. Normal ~poison~[TAG_POISON] and normal ~disease~[TAG_DISEASED] are cured in the process of raising the subject, but magical diseases and curses are not undone. None of the dead creature's equipment or possessions are affected in any way by this spell. A creature who has been turned into an undead creature or killed by a death effect can't be raised by this spell. Constructs, elementals, outsiders, and undead creatures can't be raised. Material Component: Diamonds worth a total of at least 5,000 gp.
TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_CLUMSINESS:TAG_SPELLS:: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: RayDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA coruscating ray springs from your hand.  You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to strike a target. The subject takes 1d6 points of ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY] damage, +1 point per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5). The subject's Dexterity score cannot drop below 1. Unlike normal ability damage, this damage goes away at the end of the spell's duration.
TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_ENFEEBLEMENT:TAG_SPELL: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: RayDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA coruscating ray springs from your hand.  You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to strike a target. The subject takes 1d6 points of ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH] damage, +1 point per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +5). The subject's Strength score cannot drop below 1. Unlike normal ability damage, this damage goes away at the end of the spell's duration.
TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_FROST:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Cold)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: RayDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA ray of freezing air and ice projects from your pointing finger. You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] with the ray to deal damage to a target. The ray deals 1d3 points of cold damage.
TAG_SPELLS_READ_MAGIC:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BA: ~Divination~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DIVINATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 0, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 0, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 0, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: InstantaneousBy means of Read Magic, you can decipher magical inscriptions on objects that would otherwise be unintelligible. In ToEE, casting Read Magic opens your ~inventory~[TAG_HMU_CHAR_INVENTORY_UI], at which point you select one unidentified scroll or potion and the spell ensures that it will be identified.
TAG_SPELLS_REDUCE_ANIMAL:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: One willing animal of Small, Medium, Large, or Huge sizeDuration: 1 hour/level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoThis spell functions like ~Reduce Person~[TAG_SPELLS_REDUCE_PERSON], except that it affects a single willing animal. Reduce the damage dealt by the animal's natural attacks as appropriate for its new ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER]. That damage is, as shown below.Old Damage          New Damage4d8 or 6d6             @t4d63d8 or 4d6             @t3d62d8 or 3d6             @t2d6        2d6                    @t1d8         1d8                   @t1d6         1d6                   @t1d4         1d4                   @t1d3         1d3                     @t1d2         1d2                          1           1                             0
TAG_SPELLS_REDUCE_PERSON:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Target: One humanoid creatureDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negatesSpell Resistance: YesThis spell causes instant diminution of a humanoid creature, halving its height, length, and width, and dividing its weight by 8. This decrease changes the creature's ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER] category to the next smaller one. The target gains a +2 size bonus to ~Dexterity~[TAG_DEXTERITY], a -2 size penalty to ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH] (to a minimum of 1), and a +1 bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] due to its reduced size. A creature's size will be reduced to one category below the size that they were previously. For example, a Large humanoid creature will decrease to a Medium humanoid creature and then have a space of 5 feet and a natural reach of 5 feet (previously, the Large creature would have had a 10 foot reach; now it's 5, as a Medium creature). This spell doesn't change the target's speed. All equipment worn or carried by a creature is similarly reduced by the spell. Melee and projectile weapons deal less damage. For example, if the victim of the spell formerly had attack damage of 4d8, it will decrease to 4d6. Any reduced weapon that leaves the reduced creature's possession (including a projectile or ~thrown weapon~[TAG_THROW_WEAPON]) instantly returns to its normal size. But the reduced weapon will continue to deal less damage until the attack is complete. Multiple magical effects that reduce size do not stack, which means (among other things) that you can't use a second casting of this spell to further reduce the size of a humanoid that's still under the effect of the first casting. Reduce Person counters and dispels ~Enlarge Person~[TAG_SPELLS_ENLARGE_PERSON].
TAG_SPELLS_REINCARNATION:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4Components: V, S, MCasting Time: 10 minutesRange: TouchTarget: Dead creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: None; see textSpell Resistance: Yes (harmless)With this spell, you bring back a dead creature in another body, provided that its death occurred no more than one week before the casting of the spell and the subject's soul is free and willing to return. If the subject's soul is not willing to return, the spell does not work; therefore, a subject that wants to return receives no saving throw. In ToEE, the Reincarnate effect is implemented as per the ~Raise Dead~[TAG_SPELLS_RAISE_DEAD] spell. Material Component: Rare oils and unguents worth a total of least 1,000 gp, spread over the remains.
TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_BLINDNESS_DEAFNESS :TA: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Remove Blindness/Deafness cures ~blindness~[TAG_BLINDED] or ~deafness~[TAG_DEAFENED] (your choice), whether the effect is normal or magical in nature. Remove Blindness/Deafness counters and dispels ~Blindness/Deafness~[TAG_SPELLS_BLINDNESS_DEAFNESS].
TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_CURSE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature or item touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Remove Curse instantaneously removes all curses on an object or creature. Remove Curse does not remove the curse from a cursed shield, weapon, or suit of armor, although the spell typically enables the creature afflicted with any such cursed item to remove and get rid of it. Certain special curses may not be countered by this spell or may be countered only be a caster of a certain level or higher. Remove Curse counters and dispels ~Bestow Curse~[TAG_SPELLS_BESTOW_CURSE].
TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_DISEASE:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Remove Disease cures all ~diseases~[TAG_DISEASED] that the subject is suffering from. The spell also kills parasites, including green slime and others. Certain special diseases may not be countered by this spell or may be countered only by a caster of a certain level or higher. Note: Since the spell's duration is instantaneous, it does not prevent reinfection after a new exposure to the same disease at a later date.
TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_FEAR :TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 1, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature plus one additional creature per four levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 10 minutes; see textSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against ~fear~[TAG_FEAR] effects for 10 minutes. If the subject is under the influence of a fear effect when receiving the spell, that effect is suppressed for the duration of the spell. Remove Fear counters and dispels ~Cause Fear~[TAG_SPELLS_CAUSE_FEAR].
TAG_SPELLS_REMOVE_PARALYSIS:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: Up to four creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)You can free one or more creatures from the effects of any temporary ~paralysis~[TAG_PARALYZED] or related magic, including a ~Ghoul Touch~[TAG_SPELLS_GHOUL_TOUCH] or a ~Slow~[TAG_SPELLS_SLOW] spell. If the spell is cast on one creature, the paralysis is negated. If cast on two creatures, each receives another save with a +4 resistance bonus against the effect that afflicts it. If cast on three or four creatures, each receives another save with a +2 resistance bonus. The spell does not restore ~ability scores~[TAG_ABILITY_SCORES] reduced by penalties, ~damage~[TAG_ABILITY_DAMAGED], or ~drain~[TAG_ABILITY_DRAINED].
TAG_SPELLS_REPEL_VERMIN:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 2Components: V, SRange: 10 ft.Area: 10.-ft.-radius emanation centered on youDuration: 10 min./level (D)Saving Throw: None or ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see textSpell Resistance: YesAn invisible barrier holds back vermin. A vermin with Hit Dice of less than one-third your level cannot penetrate the barrier. A vermin with Hit Dice of one-third your level or more can penetrate the barrier if it succeeds on a Will save. Even so, crossing the barrier deals the vermin 2d6 points of damage, and pressing against the barrier causes pain, which deters most vermin.
TAG_SPELLS_RESIST_ENERGY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Domain: Fire~[TAG_FIRE_D] 3, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 2, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 10 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic     The subject gains ~energy resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_RESISTANCE_TO_ENERGY] 10 against the energy type chosen, meaning that each time the creature is subjected to such damage (whether from a natural or magical source), that damage is reduced by 10 points before being applied to the creature's ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS]. The value of the energy resistance granted increases to 20 points at 7th level and to a maximum of 30 points at 11th level. The spell protects the recipient's equipment as well. Resist energy absorbs only damage. Note: Resist Energy overlaps (and does not stack with) ~Protection from Energy~[TAG_SPELLS_PROTECTION_FROM_ENERGY]. If a character is warded by Protection from Energy and Resist Energy, the protection spell absorbs damage until its power is exhausted.
TAG_SPELLS_RESISTANCE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BA: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 0, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 0, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 0, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 0Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 minuteSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
TAG_SPELLS_RESTORATION:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_C: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 4, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 4Components: V, S, MThis spell functions like ~Lesser Restoration~[TAG_SPELLS_RESTORATION_LESSER], except that in ToEE, it only restores enough ~XP~[TAG_EXPERIENCE_AND_LEVELS] to reinstate a player at the minimum amount of a level, if that player experiences ~Level Loss~[TAG_LEVEL_LOSS]. For example, if a character experiences Level Loss and his XP was drained from 7000 points at 4th level to 5000 points (which would be 3rd level), Restoration will bring his XP back up to 6000, the minimum amount needed for 4th level characters. Restoration cures all temporary ~ability damage~[TAG_ABILITY_DAMAGED], and it restores all points permanently drained from a single ~ability score~[TAG_ABILITY_SCORES]  (your choice if more than one is drained). It also eliminates any ~fatigue~[TAG_FATIGUED] or ~exhaustion~[TAG_EXHAUSTED] suffered by the target. Restoration does not restore levels or ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION] points lost due to death. Material Component: Diamond dust worth 100 gp that is sprinkled over the target.
TAG_SPELLS_RESTORATION_LESSER:TAG_SPELLS: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Healing)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Paladin~[TAG_PALADINS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 3 roundsRange: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)Lesser Restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ~ability scores~[TAG_ABILITY_SCORES] (such as ~Ray of Enfeeblement~[TAG_SPELLS_RAY_OF_ENFEEBLEMENT]) or cures 1d4 points of temporary ~ability damage~[TAG_ABILITY_DAMAGED] to one of the subject's ability scores (such as from a shadow's touch or ~poison~[TAG_POISON]). It also eliminates any ~fatigue~[TAG_FATIGUED] suffered by the character, and improves an ~exhausted~[TAG_EXHAUSTED] condition to fatigued. It does not restore permanent ~ability drain~[TAG_ABILITY_DRAINED].
TAG_SPELLS_RIGHTEOUS_MIGHT:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Domain: Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 round/level (D)This spell causes you to grow, doubling your height and multiplying your weight by 8. This increase changes your ~size~[TAG_SIZE_MODIFIER] category to the next larger one, and you gain a +4 size bonus to ~Strength~[TAG_STRENGTH] and a +2 size bonus to ~Constitution~[TAG_CONSTITUTION]. You gain a +2 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus to your natural armor. You gain ~damage reduction~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_DAMAGE_REDUCTION] 3/evil (if you normally channel positive energy) or damage reduction 3/good (if you normally channel negative energy). Your size modifier for ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] and attacks changes as appropriate to your new size category (if your original size was Diminutive, Tiny, Small, Medium, or Large, the modifier decreases by 1). This spell does not change your speed. All equipment you wear or carry is similarly enlarged by the spell. Melee and projectile weapons deal more damage. Other magical properties are not affected by this spell. Any enlarged item that leaves your possession (including a projectile or ~thrown weapon~[TAG_THROW_WEAPON]) instantly returns to its normal size. This means that thrown weapons deal their normal damage (projectiles deal damage based on the size of the weapon that fired them). Multiple magical effects that increase size do not stack. This means (among other things) that you can't use a second casting of this spell to further increase your size while you are still under the effect of the first casting.
TAG_SPELLS_SANCTUARY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_CLE: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1, ~Domain: Protection~[TAG_PROTECTION_D] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: NoAny opponent attempting to strike or otherwise directly attack the warded creature, even with a targeted spell, must attempt a Will save.  If the save succeeds, the opponent can attack normally and is unaffected by the casting of that spell.  If the save fails, the opponent can't follow through with the attack, that part of its action is lost, and it can't directly attack the warded creature for the duration of the spell.  Those not attempting to attack the subject remain unaffected.  This spell does not prevent the warded creature from being attacked or affected by area of effect spells.  The subject cannot attack without breaking the spell but may use nonattack spells or otherwise act.  This allows a warded cleric to heal wounds, for example, or to cast a ~Bless~[TAG_SPELLS_BLESS] spell, summon creatures, and so on.
TAG_SPELLS_SCARE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_2: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] Fear, Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Targets: One living creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 1 round/level or 1 round; see text for Cause FearSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] partialSpell Resistance: YesThis spell functions like ~Cause Fear~[TAG_SPELLS_CAUSE_FEAR], except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become ~frightened~[TAG_FRIGHTENED].
TAG_SPELLS_SCORCHING_RAY:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Fire)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Effect: One or more raysDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYou blast your enemies with fiery rays. You may fire one ray, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 3rd (to a maximum of three rays at 11th level). Each ray requires a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage. The rays may be fired at the same or different targets, but all bolts must be aimed at targets within 30 feet of each other and fired simultaneously.
TAG_SPELLS_SEARING_LIGHT:TAG_SPELLS::TAG: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 3, ~Domain: Sun~[TAG_SUN_D] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Effect: RayDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesFocusing divine power like a ray of the sun, you project a blast of light from your open palm. You must succeed on a ranged ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to strike your target. A creature struck by this ray of light takes 1d8 points of damage per two ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 5d8). An undead creature takes 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d6). An undead creature particularly vulnerable to bright light takes 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8). A construct or inanimate object takes only 1d6 points of damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d6).
TAG_SPELLS_SEE_INVISIBILITY:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Divination~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DIVINATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 10 min./level (D)You can see any objects or beings that are ~invisible~[TAG_INVISIBLE] within your range of vision, as if they were normally visible. Such creatures are visible to you as translucent shapes, allowing you easily to discern the difference between visible and invisible creatures. The spell does not reveal the method used to obtain invisibility. It does not reveal illusions or enable you to see through opaque objects. It does not reveal creatures who are simply ~hiding~[TAG_HIDE], ~concealed~[TAG_CONCEALMENT], or otherwise hard to see.
TAG_SPELLS_SHATTER:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Sonic)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Domain: Chaos~[TAG_CHAOS_D] 2, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Domain: Destruction~[TAG_DESTRUCTION_D] 2, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Area or Target: 5-ft.-radius spread; or one solid object or one crystalline creatureDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (object); Will negates (object) or ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] half; see textSpell Resistance: Yes (object)Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature. Targeted against a crystalline creature (of any weight), Shatter deals 1d6 points of sonic damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 10d6), with a Fortitude save for half damage. In ToEE, Shatter only results in damage to Earth creatures, such as Earth ~Elementals~[TAG_MONSTER_ELEMENTAL].
TAG_SPELLS_SHIELD:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SORCER: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION] (Force)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: PersonalTarget: YouDuration: 1 min./level (D)Shield creates an invisible, mobile disk of force that hovers in front of you. It negates ~Magic Missile~[TAG_SPELLS_MAGIC_MISSILE] attacks directed at you. The disk also provides a +4 ~shield~[TAG_SHIELD_BONUS] bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS]. The shield has no armor check penalty or ~arcane spell failure~[TAG_ARCANE_SPELL_FAILURE] chance. You are unable to use the shield spell for ~cover~[TAG_COVER].
TAG_SPELLS_SHIELD_OF_FAITH:TAG_SPELLS::T: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the touched creature that averts attacks. The spell grants the subject a +2 ~deflection~[TAG_DEFLECTION_BONUS] bonus to ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS], with an additional +1 to the bonus for every six levels you have (maximum +5 deflection bonus at 18th level).
TAG_SPELLS_SHILLELAGH:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_DR: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 1Components: V, SRange: TouchTarget: One touched nonmagical oak club or quarterstaffDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (object)Spell Resistance: Yes (object)In ToEE, you summon a ~quarterstaff~[TAG_WEAPONS_QUARTERSTAFF] that deals 2d6 points of damage. The staff becomes a weapon with a +1 ~enhancement~[TAG_ENHANCEMENT_BONUS] bonus on ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and damage rolls. (A quarterstaff gains this enhancement for both ends of the weapon.) These effects only occur when the weapon is wielded by you. If you do not wield it, the weapon behaves as if unaffected by this spell.
TAG_SPELLS_SHOCKING_GRASP:TAG_SPELLS::TA: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Electricity)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature or object touchedDuration: Instantaneous Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesYour successful melee ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] deals 1d6 points of electricity damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 5d6). When delivering the jolt, you gain a +3 bonus on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] if the opponent is wearing metal armor (or made out of metal, carrying a lot of metal, or the like).
TAG_SPELLS_SHOUT:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_4: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Sonic)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 4, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: VCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: 30 ft.Area: Cone-shaped burstDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partial or ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] negates (object); see textSpell Resistance: Yes (object)You emit an ear-splitting yell that deafens and damages creatures in its path. Any creature within the area is ~deafened~[TAG_DEAFENED] for 2d6 rounds and takes 5d6 points of sonic damage. A successful save negates the deafness and reduces the damage by half. Any crystalline creature takes 1d6 points of sonic damage per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum 15d6). In ToEE, these crystalline creatures are Earth creatures, such as Earth ~Elementals~[TAG_MONSTER_ELEMENTAL]. An affected creature is allowed a Fortitude save to reduce the damage by half. A Shout spell cannot penetrate a ~Silence~[TAG_SPELLS_SILENCE] spell.
TAG_SPELLS_SILENCE:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_: ~Illusion~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ILLUSION] (Glamer)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a creature, object, or point in spaceDuration: 1 min./level (D)Saving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates; see text or none (object)Spell Resistance: Yes; see text or no (object)Upon casting of this spell, complete silence prevails in the affected area. All sound is stopped: Conversation is impossible, spells with verbal components cannot be cast, and no noise whatsoever issues from, enters, or passes through the area. In ToEE, there are 2 potential target areas focused on when casting Silence.  The first is the general area of silence. A space is rendered silent and the Silence spell stays only in that area.  The second target could be a creature, and the Silence spell actually moves with them, rather than staying solely in one area. The creature then cannot simply move away from the Silence spell. An unwilling creature can attempt a Will save to negate the spell and can use ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE], if any. Items in a creature's possession or magic items that emit sound receive the benefits of saves and spell resistance, but unattended objects and points in space do not. This spell provides a defense against sonic or language-based attacks, such as ~Command~[TAG_SPELLS_COMMAND], harpy song, and the like.
TAG_SPELLS_SLAY_LIVING:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_C: ~Necromancy~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_NECROMANCY] (Death)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Domain: Death~[TAG_DEATH_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Living creature touchedDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partialSpell Resistance: YesYou can slay any one living creature. You must succeed on a melee ~touch attack~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] to touch the subject, and it can avoid death with a successful Fortitude save. If it succeeds, it instead takes 3d6 points of damage +1 point per ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL]. (The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds on its save, however.)
TAG_SPELLS_SLEEP:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_1: ~Enchantment~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ENCHANTMENT] (Compulsion) Mind-AffectingLevel: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 1, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 1Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 roundRange: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burstDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesA Sleep spell causes a magical slumber to overcome 4 Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first. Among creatures with equal HD, those who are closest to the spell's point of origin are affected first. Hit Dice that are not sufficient to affect a creature are wasted. For example, Mialee casts Sleep at 3 kobolds (1/2 HD), 2 gnolls (2 HD), and an ogre (4 HD). All three kobolds and one gnoll are affected:                               (1/2 + 1/2 + 1/2 + 2 = 3 1/2 HD)     The remaining 1/2 HD is not enough to affect the last gnoll or the ogre. Mialee can't choose to have Sleep affect the ogre or the two gnolls. ~Sleeping~[TAG_SLEEPING] creatures are ~helpless~[TAG_HELPLESS]. Slapping or wounding awakens an affected creature, but normal noise does not. Awakening a creature is a ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]. Sleep does not affect ~unconscious~[TAG_UNCONSCIOUS] creatures, constructs, or undead creatures.
TAG_SPELLS_SLEET_STORM:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_D: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation) ColdLevel: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)Area: Cylinder (40-ft.-radius, 20 ft. high)Duration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoDriving sleet blocks all sight within it and causes the ground in the area to be icy. A creature can walk within or through the area of sleet at half normal speed with a ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] save. Failure means the creature falls. In ToEE, a creature wearing metal armor also takes 2d8 cold damage.
TAG_SPELLS_SLOW:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_BARD_3 T: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 3, ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 3Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apartDuration: 1 round/levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negatesSpell Resistance: YesAn affected creature moves and attacks at a drastically slowed rate. A slowed creature can take only a single ~move action~[TAG_MOVEMENT_ACTION] or standard action each turn, but not both (nor may it take ~full-round actions~[TAG_FULL_ROUND_ACTION]). Additionally, it takes a -1 penalty on ~attack rolls~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL], ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS], and ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] saves. A slowed creature moves at half its normal speed. Multiple Slow effects don't stack. Slow counters and dispels ~Haste~[TAG_SPELLS_HASTE].
TAG_SPELLS_SOFTEN_EARTH_AND_STONE:TAG_SP: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION] (Earth)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 2, ~Domain: Earth~[TAG_EARTH_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Area: 10-ft. square/level; see textDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: NoWhen this spell is cast, all natural, undressed earth or stone in the spell's area is softened. Wet earth becomes thick mud, dry earth becomes loose sand or dirt, and stone becomes soft clay. You affect a 10-foot square area to a depth of 1 to 4 feet, depending on the toughness or resilience of the ground at that spot. Magical, enchanted, dressed, or worked stone cannot be affected. Earth or stone creatures are not affected. A creature in the sediment must succeed on ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] save or be caught for 1d2 rounds and unable to move, attack, or cast spells. A creature that succeeds on its save can move through the sediment at half speed, but it can't ~run~[TAG_RUN] or ~charge~[TAG_CHARGE].
TAG_SPELLS_SOLID_FOG:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_SOR: ~Conjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_CONJURATION] (Creation)Level: ~Sorcerer~[TAG_SORCERERS]/~Wizard~[TAG_WIZARDS] 4Components: V, SDuration: 1 min./levelSpell Resistance: NoThis spell functions like ~Fog Cloud~[TAG_SPELLS_FOG_CLOUD], but in addition to obscuring sight the Solid Fog is so thick that any creature attempting to move through it progresses at a speed of 5 feet, regardless of its normal speed, and it takes a -2 penalty on all melee ~attack~[TAG_ATTACK_ROLL] and melee damage rolls. The vapors prevent effective ranged weapon ~attacks~[TAG_RANGED_ATTACKS] (except for magic rays and the like). A creature can't take a ~5-foot step~[TAG_5_FOOT_STEP] while in Solid Fog.
TAG_SPELLS_SOUND_BURST:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_B: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Sonic)Level: ~Bard~[TAG_BARDS] 2, ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)Area: 10-ft.-radius spreadDuration: InstantaneousSaving Throw: ~Fortitude~[TAG_FORTITUDE] partialSpell Resistance: YesYou blast an area with a tremendous cacophony. Every creature in the area takes 1d8 points of sonic damage and must succeed on a Fortitude save to avoid being ~stunned~[TAG_STUNNED] for 1 round. Creatures that cannot hear are not stunned but are still damaged.
TAG_SPELLS_SPELL_RESISTANCE:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Abjuration~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_ABJURATION]Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 5, ~Domain: Magic~[TAG_MAGIC_D] 5, ~Domain: Protection~[TAG_PROTECTION_D] 5Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: TouchTarget: Creature touchedDuration: 1 min./levelSaving Throw: ~Will~[TAG_WILL] negates (harmless)Spell Resistance: Yes (harmless)The creature gains ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE] equal to 12 + your ~caster level~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL].
TAG_SPELLS_SPIKE_GROWTH:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION]Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 3, ~Ranger~[TAG_RANGERS] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: One 20-ft. square/levelDuration: 1 hour/level (D)Saving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] partialSpell Resistance: YesAny ground-covering vegetation in the spell's area of effect becomes very hard and sharply pointed without changing its appearance. In areas of bare earth, roots and rootlets act in the same way. In ToEE, Spike Growth can only be cast outdoors. Any creature moving on foot into or through the spell's area of effect takes 1d4 points of piercing damage for every 5 feet of movement through the spiked area.     Any creature that takes damage from this spell must also succeed on a Reflex save or suffer injuries to its feet and legs that slow its land speed by one-half. This speed penalty lasts for 24 hours or until the injured creature receives a cure spell (which also restores ~hit points~[TAG_HIT_POINTS]). Another character can remove the penalty by taking 10 minutes to dress the injuries and succeeding on a ~Heal~[TAG_HEAL] check against the spell's save DC.
TAG_SPELLS_SPIKE_STONES:TAG_SPELLS::TAG_: ~Transmutation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_TRANSMUTATION] (Earth)Level: ~Druid~[TAG_DRUIDS] 4, ~Domain: Earth~[TAG_EARTH_D] 4Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Area: One 20-ft. square/levelDuration: 1 hour/level (D)Saving Throw: ~Reflex~[TAG_REFLEX] partialSpell Resistance: YesRocky ground, stone floors, and similar surfaces shape themselves into long, sharp points that blend into the background. Spike Stones impede progress through an area and deal damage. Any creature moving on foot into or though the spell's area moves at half speed.     In addition, each creature moving through the area takes 1d8 points of piercing damage for every 5 feet of movement through the spiked area.     Any creature that takes damage from this spell must also succeed on a Reflex save to avoid injuries to its feet and legs. A failed save causes the creature's speed to be reduced to half normal for 24 hours or until the injured creature receives a cure spell. Another character can remove the penalty by taking 10 minutes to dress the injuries and succeeding on a ~Heal~[TAG_HEAL] check against the spell's save DC.
TAG_SPELLS_SPIRITUAL_WEAPON:TAG_SPELLS::: ~Evocation~[TAG_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_EVOCATION] (Force)Level: ~Cleric~[TAG_CLERICS] 2, ~Domain: War~[TAG_WAR_D] 2Components: V, SCasting Time: 1 ~standard action~[TAG_STANDARD_ACTION]Range: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)Effect: Magic weapon of forceDuration: 1 round/level (D)Saving Throw: NoneSpell Resistance: YesA weapon made of pure force springs into existence and attacks opponents at a distance, as you direct it, dealing 1d8 force damage per hit, +1 point per three ~caster levels~[TAG_CASTER_LEVEL] (maximum +3). The weapon takes the shape of a weapon with some spiritual significance or symbolism to you and has the same threat range and critical multipliers as a real weapon of its form. It strikes the opponent as you designate, starting with one attack in the round the spell is cast and continuing each round thereafter on your turn. It uses your ~base attack bonus~[TAG_LEVEL_BONUSES] plus your ~Wisdom~[TAG_WISDOM] modifier as its attack bonus. It strikes as a spell, not as a weapon, so, for example, it can damage creatures that have ~damage reduction~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_DAMAGE_REDUCTION]. The weapon always strikes from your direction. It does not get a ~flanking~[TAG_FLANKING] bonus or help a combatant get one. Your feats (such as ~Weapon Focus~[TAG_WEAPON_FOCUS]) or combat actions (such as ~charge~[TAG_CHARGE]) do not affect the weapon. If the weapon goes beyond the spell range, if it goes out of your sight, or if you are not directing it, the weapon returns to you and hovers. The Spiritual Weapon is capable of multiple attacks, provided that your base attack bonus allows you to do so. The Spiritual Weapon is a ranged weapon. It cannot be attacked or harmed by physical attacks, but ~Dispel Magic~[TAG_SPELLS_DISPEL_MAGIC] affects it. A Spiritual Weapon's ~AC~[TAG_ARMOR_CLASS] against ~touch attacks~[TAG_TOUCH_ATTACK] is 12 (10 + size bonus for Tiny object). If an attacked creature has ~spell resistance~[TAG_SPECIAL_ABILITIES_SPELL_RESISTANCE], you make a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) against that spell resistance every time the Spiritual Weapon attacks. The weapon that you get may be a force replica of your ~deity's~[TAG_RELIGION] own personal weapon, many of which have individual names. The weapons for each deity are listed in the entries for those gods.
